column4: Im running into a lot of keyboard lag is there anyway to reduce this? as i type something it sometimes takes a while to acctualy show up on the screen for instance i can finish typing a whole word and then it will pop up.
i acctualy have to turn off repeat keys because its so bad
What are your hardware statistics?
amd 5600+ 2GB ram 8800GTS
Ok...
keyboardis a old logitech i had laying around
I would say your swap is not mounted...
Jack_sparrow:wired
can you please run the command "mount"?
And post your output
Xavieran: Yes one second please
Ok...
xavieran:Done what information do you want from the output
xeom:Sorry for the wait...just the output into pastebin
xavieran:http://pastebin.com/d699c6730
eom:ty
xeom:ty
xeom:Just as I thought...your swap partition is not mounted...just to be sure ,however,could you also paste the output of the command "cat /etc/fstab"?
yea i acctualy didnt make a swap partion wasn't sure i needed it. One sec for that other part
http://pastebin.com/d62103dde
xeom:You definetely need it!
Xavieran: ok what would be quickest way to edit the partion and make one? as well how big should it be?
You will need to boot into the livecd and create a swap partition...with the amount of ram you have I would say 2gb would suffice...
i thought i wouldnt need any with 2gb of ram will do now thanks for the help
